title: Tasting Nancy
description: A true confession from Daniella Cerveny, which describes the metamorphosis of her marriage as she and her husband embark on their swinging sexual awakening. Sharing her first female/female experience in around 2,500 words edited by Secret Narrative, this is the opening confession in a series of swinging truths. Written in USA English, this short confession is our first venture in a new collaboration.
author: Daniella Cerveny
